author: RTÉ News
title: Experimental virus drug fails in human trials
description: The experimental coronavirus treatment remdesivir has failed in its first randomised clinical trial, inadvertently released results have shown, dampening expectations for the closely watched drug.
content:
The experimental coronavirus treatment remdesivir has failed in its first randomised clinical trial, inadvertently released results have shown, dampening expectations for the closely watched drug.
